text: Michael Billen (4 October 1955 â€“ 4 January 2022) was a German politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany. He was in the Landtag of Rhineland-Palatinate from 1996 to 2020. He was born in Trier, West Germany. Billen died from leukemia in Mainz, Germany on 4 January 2022, at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Rhineland-Palatinate Category:Deaths from leukemia
title: Michael Billen
